original_task: create a file called test.txt with hello world, then read it back

steps.description: Create a file named test.txt with 'hello world' content
steps.success_criteria: File test.txt with 'hello world' content is created
steps.error_handling: If file creation fails, handle the error and notify the user
steps.result: File test.txt with 'hello world' content has been successfully created.

steps.description: Read the content of the file test.txt
steps.success_criteria: Successfully read the content of test.txt
steps.error_handling: If reading the file fails, handle the error and notify the user

overall_strategy: Create a file named test.txt with 'hello world' content, then read and verify the content of the file.
risk_assessment: Potential risks include file creation failure, read operation failure, or incorrect content read. Mitigation strategies include proper error handling and validation at each step.
